name: Tofu Tower
storyline: Just outside a small town in the land of Welgaea is a gigantic tower, reaching into the heavens, filled with deadly monsters unlike any others in the world. The tiny witch Tofu Muffin (who is neither tofu nor a muffin) just wants to help people, and she's happened upon a town with a request. Legend has it the tower has a magical artifact in it that will help ward off the monsters threatening the city, but nobody knows if the legends are true, or if the tower even has a top! Tofu's going to have to collect cards, level up, and explore a randomly generated tower to see if the legends are true.
summary: See how high you can battle your way up the tower with your ever-growing collection of monster cards
